snippet.title: UNITED 1944 Reveal Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
UNITED 1944 is a first person shooter - crafting - strategy game set in World War 2 focused on base conquest and close quarters combat. Scavenge resources, craft weaponry and equipment, build defensive walls around your base & outposts and prepare to take the last stand in 16v16 battles.

*Wishlist on Steam Now:* https://bit.ly/3zmqrY0
*Join our Discord* - News about our beta will be updated here: https://discord.gg/united1944

*UNITED1944 Twitter:* https://twitter.com/United_1944
*UNITED1944 Facebook:* https://www.facebook.com/united1944game
*UNITED1944 Instagram:* https://www.instagram.com/united_1944/
